p: In late 2019, the first cases of pneumonia of unknown cause were reported in Wuhan. The SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus was soon identified as the causative agent of the COVID-19 disease. It usually presents with fever, cough and dyspnea, presenting a mortality rate of approximately 2%. 7, 8 On January 30, 2020 the WHO declared COVID-19 as an epidemic and PHEIC (Public Health Emergency of International Concern). On March 11 it was classified as a pandemic after its rapid international spread.
